Sioyek Rebuild

title: Sioyek Rebuild
text:
In yay or paru, after you upgrade a package, it is up to you to rebuild it when needed. This is the case for sioyek. Below you can find the command to rebuild the package.


The solution
The command to rebuil sioyek is
yay --rebuild sioyek
